title_narrative: Food Safety Risk Analysis Capacity Building program in Latin America
description_narrative:
Implementation of a regional meeting to discuss and agree on countries  Food Safety Risk Analysis capacity building needs and key country interventions.  
The work will produce a final project proposal aimed to develop an innovative capacity building program based on South-South cooperation on food safety risk analysis for national officials. This project proposal will provide guidance to strengthening Food Safety Risk Analysis (FSRA) capabilities and harmonising the FSRA systems, in accordance with the Codex FSRA Framework.
